decks.notes: The deck focuses on quickly assembling the Greasefang Parhelion combo, utilizing cards like Greasefang, Okiba Boss, Parhelion II, and Monument to Endurance. It aims to protect the combo pieces with Seasoned Hallowblade and Sheltered by Ghosts while disrupting the opponent's strategy with cards like Thoughtseize and Fatal Push. The deck also includes a mix of lands to ensure consistent mana production and utility. Overall, the deck aims to quickly assemble its combo pieces and overwhelm the opponent with powerful synergies and disruptive plays.

This deck is focused on aggressive, fast-paced gameplay with a variety of low-cost creatures and direct damage spells. The main goal is to quickly reduce the opponent's life total by attacking with creatures like Hired Claw and Emberheart Challenger while also using spells like Burst Lightning and Lightning Strike to deal direct damage. The deck includes some land cards that can provide additional damage or utility. Overall, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a relentless assault and finish the game before the opponent can stabilize.

The deck focuses on quickly casting spells to bring back Arclight Phoenix from the graveyard and overwhelm the opponent with aggressive plays. It includes card draw and filtering with Consider, Opt, Treasure Cruise, and Sleight of Hand to find key pieces and maintain momentum. Fiery Impulse and Lightning Axe provide removal options while Cori-Steel Cutter and Picklock Prankster add extra pressure on the opponent. The inclusion of Artist's Talent, Into the Flood Maw, and Profit's Eidetic Memory offer additional utility and versatility to outmaneuver opponents in a fast-paced game.

The Mono Black Control deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's strategy through discard spells like Thoughtseize and Duress, removal spells like Fatal Push and Go for the Throat, and powerful planeswalkers like Liliana of the Veil. It also gains advantages by utilizing cards like Sheoldred, the Apocalypse and Graveyard Trespasser to control the battlefield. The deck also has a strong creature base with Gifted Aetherborn and Cecil, Dark Knight, while utilizing lands like Castle Locthwain and Mutavault for additional value. This deck aims to control the game and win through attrition and value.

This deck aims to quickly fill up the graveyard with cheap instants and sorceries in order to bring back Arclight Phoenix from the graveyard for a low cost. The deck includes a mix of cantrips, removal spells, and powerful card draw spells to help cycle through the deck quickly and bring back multiple copies of Arclight Phoenix in a single turn. The inclusion of Temporal Trespass and Treasure Cruise allows the deck to refill its hand and continue applying pressure on the opponent. The deck is focused on aggressive plays and fast-paced games.

The main concept of this Boros Aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of efficient creatures and cheap removal spells. By playing aggressively with cards like Venerated Loxodon and Knight-Errant of Eos, the deck aims to quickly establish a board presence and apply pressure on the opponent. The inclusion of cards like Needleverge Pathway and Inspiring Vantage ensures a smooth mana base, allowing for consistent plays. Overall, the deck emphasizes speed and aggression to take control of the game early on and secure a victory.

The main focus of this red aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with fast and efficient creatures and burn spells to reduce their life total to zero as quickly as possible. Cards like Bonecrusher Giant and Kumano Faces Kakkazan provide substantial damage output, while Burn spells like Lightning Strike and Burst Lightning can finish off weakened opponents. The deck also includes creatures like Heartfire Hero and Sunspine Lynx to provide additional pressure and resilience. Overall, the deck aims to aggressively push through damage and control the pace of the game to secure a swift victory.

The main focus of this Selesnya Aggro deck is to quickly establish a board presence with efficient creatures and disrupt the opponent's strategies with removal spells. By utilizing cards like Collected Company and Kayla's Reconstruction, the deck can maintain pressure and generate card advantage. The deck also includes life gain synergies with cards like Bishop of Wings and Righteous Valkyrie to help stabilize against aggressive opponents. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a mix of aggressive creatures and disruptive spells in order to secure a swift victory.

The deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with aggressive creatures and removal spells in order to deal damage as quickly as possible. It utilizes a combination of powerful creatures like Bloodtithe Harvester and Sheoldred, the Apocalypse, along with efficient removal spells like Fatal Push and Go for the Throat to control the board and keep the pressure on the opponent. The deck also includes disruptive cards like Thoughtseize and Duress to disrupt the opponent's game plan and clear the way for its aggressive creatures to attack.

The primary focus of this Aggro Red Deck Wins archetype is to quickly and aggressively deal damage to the opponent before they have a chance to stabilize. The deck is filled with low-cost, high-impact creatures and burn spells to continually apply pressure and drain the opponent's life total. By utilizing fast creatures like Emberheart Challenger and burn spells like Burst Lightning, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent and secure a swift victory. This deck excels at maintaining a relentless offensive presence and punishing any slow starts from the opponent.

Utilizing the power of Lotus Field, this deck focuses on quickly ramping up mana and generating card advantage to set up for a game-ending combo. By carefully managing resources and using cards like Scapeshift and Crumbling Vestige to maximize mana production, the deck aims to overwhelm opponents with explosive plays. The deck also includes cards like The Wandering Minstrel and Lumra, Bellow of the Woods to manipulate the board state and protect key combo pieces. With careful planning and strategic decision-making, this deck can quickly dominate the battlefield and secure victory.

The main concept of this Mono Black Control deck is to disrupt the opponent's game plan by utilizing hand disruption spells like Thoughtseize and Duress, removal spells such as Fatal Push and Go for the Throat, and powerful planeswalkers like Liliana of the Veil. The deck also aims to control the board with cards like Graveyard Trespasser and Sheoldred, the Apocalypse while gaining incremental card advantage through cards like Cling to Dust and Castle Locthwain. Additionally, the deck has some resiliency with the inclusion of Unholy Annex / Ritual Chamber and efficient threats like Gifted Aetherborn.

This Mono White Control deck focuses on control through a mixture of removal spells, enchantments, and planeswalkers, with the ability to generate card advantage and maintain board presence. The inclusion of Yorion as a companion adds additional value and allows for a more versatile playstyle. The deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while gradually building up its own resources, ultimately winning through attrition and outvaluing the opponent. The mana base is designed to support the control strategy and ensure consistency in casting its spells.

This UR Aggro deck focuses on quickly flooding the board with low-cost creatures and cheap burn spells to keep pressure on the opponent. The deck also includes card draw and filtering to maintain resources and ensure a steady stream of threats. The key strategy is to maintain tempo through efficient plays and aggressive creatures, using burn spells to clear blockers and finish off opponents. With a mix of early aggression and late-game card advantage, this deck aims to overwhelm opponents before they can stabilize.

The main goal of this Red Deck Wins Aggro deck is to quickly and efficiently deal damage to the opponent's life total. Using burn spells like Burst Lightning and Lightning Strike, along with aggressive creatures like Emberheart Challenger and Bonecrusher Giant, the deck aims to apply pressure and close out the game before the opponent has a chance to stabilize. With a focus on fast, direct damage and creature aggression, this deck is designed to overwhelm the opponent and win the game through sheer force and speed.

The main concept of this Gruul Aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive playstyle, utilizing cards that deal quick damage and create a powerful board presence. The deck focuses on utilizing creatures like Manifold Mouse, Heartfire Hero, and Pawpatch Recruit along with burn spells like Burst Lightning and Reckless Rage to quickly chip away at the opponent's life total. The inclusion of cards like Cragcrown Pathway and Mutavault provide additional utility and flexibility in combat, while Innkeeper's Talent helps generate card advantage to keep the pressure on the opponent.
